news.content: That's it! :) Soon, we’ll share some highlights from 2020 and some words about 2021.
news.excerpt: Let’s take a moment to acknowledge what a year it’s been for all of us around the world.

previous.title: Harmony Integrates with ThreeFold’s Decentralized Grid
previous.excerpt: Harmony and ThreeFold will work together on developer and user projects on the ThreeFold Grid and Pangaea..

next.title: DigiByte integrates with ThreeFold’s decentralized Grid
next.excerpt: The DigiByte Foundation and the ThreeFold Foundation are aligned – both focused on values, working towards their visions and missions in creating a truly decentralized, equal, and sustainable world that empowers humanity.
